classes.name: CharacterTracker
classes.docstring:
Helper for font subsetting by the pdf and ps backends.

Maintains a mapping of font paths to the set of character codepoints that
are being used from that font.

methods.name: track
methods.docstring: Record that string *s* is being typeset using font *font*.

methods.name: track_glyph
methods.docstring: Record that codepoint *glyph* is being typeset using font *font*.

functions.name: get_glyphs_subset
functions.docstring:
Subset a TTF font

Reads the named fontfile and restricts the font to the characters.

Parameters
----------
fontfile : str
    Path to the font file
characters : str
    Continuous set of characters to include in subset

Returns
-------
fontTools.ttLib.ttFont.TTFont
    An open font object representing the subset, which needs to
    be closed by the caller.

functions.name: font_as_file
functions.docstring:
Convert a TTFont object into a file-like object.

Parameters
----------
font : fontTools.ttLib.ttFont.TTFont
    A font object

Returns
-------
BytesIO
    A file object with the font saved into it

functions.name: track
functions.docstring: Record that string *s* is being typeset using font *font*.

functions.name: track_glyph
functions.docstring: Record that codepoint *glyph* is being typeset using font *font*.
